Type Method# buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
static func buildBlock<R0, R1, R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7, R8>(
    _ r0: R0,
    _ r1: R1,
    _ r2: R2,
    _ r3: R3,
    _ r4: R4,
    _ r5: R5,
    _ r6: R6,
    _ r7: R7,
    _ r8: R8
) -> some ResolverSpecification where R0 : Resolver, R1 : Resolver, R2 : Resolver, R3 : Resolver, R4 : Resolver, R5 : Resolver, R6 : Resolver, R7 : Resolver, R8 : Resolver

```

Available when `Property` conforms to `_IntentValue`.## [See Also](/documentation/appintents/resolverspecificationbuilder/buildblock(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)#see-also)
